article: Two brothers lived on the 80 floor. On coming home one day, they were depressed to realize that the lifts broke _ . Although they carried a big pack of luggage, it seemed to have no other choice, so they decided to climb the _ up together! When they arrived at the 20 floor, the elder brother _ putting the luggage there and coming back for it the next day. Feeling much more relaxed, they _ to climb up. When they _ to the 40 ,the younger started to complain and _ of them quarreled till the 60 floor. Arriving there, they were so tired that they didn't have any _ to quarrel. The younger said,"Don't quarrel, let's finish climbing the stairs."And they went on climbing _ ,finally reaching the 80th!They felt _ arriving at the door of their home. But soon they found their _ were kept on the 20th. This story is a reflection on our lives. Many of us live under the _ of our parents, teachers and friends when young. We seldom get to do the things we love. By the age of twenty,with so much pressure, we get _ and then decide to throw down this load. _ from this load, we work energetically with ambitious dreams. But at the age of forty,we discover the youth has already died, so much _ is produced unavoidably, and begin to feel sorry for that. When you _ the age of sixty ,we discover life hasn't remained too much, so we tell ourselves not to complain and _ the remaining days! Upon that we walk silently over our own _ years of life. Arriving at the _ of the life, we think there is nothing left to disappoint us, only the _ that we can't rest in peace. Follow your dream , so you will not live with regrets.
